name: Art and Painting
description: Collecting various forms of human artistic expression, from traditional oil painting to new media installations, reflecting the aesthetic characteristics of different cultures and eras.

groups.name: Impressionist Masterpieces
groups.description: Pursuing light and color changes, such as Monet and Renoir's works.

groups.name: Abstract Art
groups.description: Using shapes, lines, and colors to convey subjective emotions.

groups.name: Classical Realism
groups.description: Realistic techniques, precise brushstrokes, emphasizing perspective and human anatomy.

groups.name: Contemporary Art
groups.description: Breaking traditional media boundaries, emphasizing concept and innovation.

groups.name: Watercolor and Ink
groups.description: Eastern ink wash and blank space, poetic and serene.

groups.name: Mural and Graffiti
groups.description: Large-scale public space paintings, bringing vitality to urban landscapes.

groups.name: Pop Art
groups.description: Popular art born from mass culture and consumer society.

groups.name: Modern Illustration
groups.description: Creative painting forms commonly seen in commerce and publishing.

groups.name: Watercolor Painting
groups.description: Transparent color, soft layering, and painting techniques.

groups.name: Comic Style
groups.description: Japanese or Western comic creation, with vivid frames and characters.

groups.name: Still Life Drawing
groups.description: Depicting desktop objects, highlighting light, texture, and structure.

groups.name: Human Body Art
groups.description: Displaying human curves and beauty, combining anatomy and aesthetics.

groups.name: Landscape Sketching
groups.description: On-site depiction of nature, recording real light and shadow changes.

groups.name: Digital Art
groups.description: Multi-form art created using computers or digital boards.

groups.name: Surrealism
groups.description: Combining dreams and reality elements, creating absurd and fantastical feelings.

groups.name: Renaissance Period
groups.description: Masterpieces by Da Vinci, Michelangelo, and other great masters.

groups.name: Concept Art
groups.description: Creative images used for pre-production design in film, games, etc.

groups.name: Street Culture Graffiti
groups.description: Self-expression and social issues fusion in youth subculture.

groups.name: Printmaking Art
groups.description: Using carving, etching, or screen printing for multiple reproductions.

groups.name: Ukiyo-e Style
groups.description: Folk art prints originating from Japan's Edo period.

groups.name: Sculpture Art (3D)
groups.description: Three-dimensional works shaped from wood, stone, metal, or clay.

groups.name: Installation Art
groups.description: Comprehensive environment and material creation, offering immersive or interactive experiences.

groups.name: Expressionism
groups.description: Exaggeration and distortion to emphasize the artist's intense inner emotions.

groups.name: New Media Interactive Art
groups.description: Using digital technology to interact with the audience, pushing the boundaries of art.
